name: Herbert Müller
introduction: Herbert Mller (born 10 May 1940 in Reinach, Kulm, Aargau, Switzerland  died 24 May 1981 at the Nrburgring in Nrburg, Ahrweiler, Rhineland-Palatinate, West Germany) was a Swiss racing driver who entered, but did not complete in, the 1971 Italian Grand Prix.  He also finished fifth in the 1963 Pau Grand Prix.
